title: 41: The Grand Inquisitor
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: The "Grand Inquisitor" chapter (paired with the "Rebellion" chapter) in Dostoevsky's "Brother's Karamazov is a scathing criticism of Christianity and the central crux of the book. We discuss.
itunes:author: Arty, Beezer, Grumblez
itunes:subtitle: Because doubt is a party
